item.description: Kevin Scott who has been a regular racer with us for many years now is relocating to CT, about an hour away from the Lime Rock Park Speedway.  To give him a fitting send off and to wish him the very best in his new job, let's get together and burn some rubber (we always lap up any excuse to burn up that rubber) and top it off with drinks and food at the Ascari restaurant afterward.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the registration desk
item.name: Farewell Run for Kevin @ F1 Boston Indoor
